tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE model_performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES neural_network_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE neural_network_models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_runs (
    run_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID REFERENCES neural_network_models(model_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    total_epochs INT,
    total_iterations INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    run_id UUID REFERENCES training_runs(run_id),
    epoch_number INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE model_parameters (
    parameter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES neural_network_models(model_id),
    learning_rate DECIMAL(4,2),
    batch_size INT,
    activation_function VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES neural_network_models(model_id),
    loss DECIMAL(6,4),
    precision DECIMAL(5,2),
    recall DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE model_training_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES neural_network_models(model_id),
    dataset_name VARCHAR(100),
    data_size INT,
    features TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE batch_size_metrics (
    batch_size_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    batch_size INT,
    training_time INTERVAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE layer_metrics (
    layer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    layer_name VARCHAR(50),
    layer_type VARCHAR(50),
    num_parameters INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE execution_metrics (
    execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    execution_time INTERVAL,
    CPU_utilization FLOAT,
    GPU_utilization FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    hyperparameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    dropout_rate FLOAT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50),
    batch_normalization BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(model_id)
);
